name: Ultramarine RS 21
description: Ultramarine RS 21 is a medium tinting strength, mid shade Ultramarine blue. It is heat fast, lightfast, easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.Ultramarine RS 21 is widely used alone to obtain a bright, transparent shade of blue, or in combination with other pigments such as titanium dioxide, with which it gives an attractive pastel shade.Ultramarine RS 21 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applications inpaint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries. Ultramarine RS 21 can be used in plastics.
